column1: Little Goat Diner////Note of warning.  They use a system that texts you when they are ready to seat you and don't go looking for you unlike Girl & the Goat.  The place can get exceedingly loud and busy
column2: so double check that they have your number down correctly.  Get them to repeat the number to you if they don't offer to do so as a courtesy.  Our hour wait turned into nearly a few hours before we realized what was going on.  Time flies when you're with good company and the bar is working their magic. :)
